explains: v. 包括，包含；构成，组成

sentences.en: Older people comprise a large proportion of those living in poverty.
sentences.cn: 在那些生活贫困的人中，老年人占有很大的比例。

sentences.en: People with disabilities comprise a large part of the population.
sentences.cn: 残疾人占人口的很大一部分。

sentences.en: These finds, together with later finds, comprise all that experts know about Minoan culture.
sentences.cn: 这些发现，连同之后的发现，是专家对米诺斯文化的全部了解。
